$description: | What does this do? | Limits applications available for download in the Microsoft Store via the "Private Store" functionality. This policy allows you to restrict your users to only those applications that you deem necessary. | | Why should you use this? | If you want to limit the applications which users may download to those in your private store. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. Users may only use apps that have been added to the private store. | | Learn more | [Distribute apps using your private store](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-store/distribute-apps-from-your-private-store) |
